scripts.preview: npm --workspace my-project-ui run build && shx rm -rf packages/electron/dist && shx cp -r packages/ui/dist packages/electron && npm --workspace my-project-electron start
scripts.dev: cross-env ELECTRON_DEV=true npx concurrently -n "  vite  ,electron" "npm --workspace my-project-ui run dev" "npm --workspace my-project-electron start"
